label: Packaging
comment: Any wrapping or containment, such as a box or a barrel, of goods.

datatypeProperties.comment: A total number of units contained in this supply chain packaging.
A code specifying an additional instruction for this supply chain packaging.
The total number of units in a layer of this supply chain packaging.
The number of units of this type of supply chain packaging which can be stacked on top of each other.
The indication of whether or not there is an additional instruction for this supply chain packaging.
A code specifying the disposal method of this supply chain packaging.
The measure of the maximum stackability weight of this supply chain packaging.
The total number of units of this supply chain packaging facing the customer, such as would be seen when this packaging is placed on a retail shelf.
The number of content layers that are or may be packaged with this supply chain packaging, such as the number of layers of product on a pallet.

objectProperties.comment: A marking specified for this supply chain packaging, such as an inscription, stamp or label to indicate date, ownership, quality, manufacture or origin.

referencedBy.comment: Packaging applicable for use with this trade product.
Supply chain packaging used for this logistics package.
